On the Train En Route for California--Dear Sister Lizzie: [PROBABLY ELLEN WHITE'S SISTER, ELIZABETH BANGS.] After I left you Monday, I was very sick. Tuesday, nervous and suffering with headache, 


                                    -141- 

unable to sit up. Tuesday night we arrived at Council Bluffs. There we stopped off to visit Sister Milner. After walking about half a mile we found her not at home. I had not tasted food through the day and was still suffering with nervous headache. We walked back to a hotel, the nearest one we could find. It was not very promising. We were shown to our rooms--two very small rooms above the kitchen. In the rooms were only small windows, one in each room.
